title: Sri Lanka schedules 3 hours power cuts for April 19
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Power cuts of 3 hours and 20 minutes have been approved for Sri Lanka on April 19, 2022, Public Utilities Commission Chairman Janaka Ratnayake said as forex shortages due to money printing by the central bank created forex shortages disrupting fuel imports.
All Areas (ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW) will have power cuts of 2 hours from 0900am to 0500pm and 1 hour and 20 minutes from 0500pm and 0900pm.
The same power cuts are now scheduled for April 20 as well. (Colombo/ April 18/2022)
